Welcome to the DBEV Phylogenomics Workshop

Jan 27, 2022

We are excited to start a new phylogenomics workshop, hosted by the Department of Biology and Plant Ecology (DBEV) at the University of Antananarivo. Workshop activities will take place over three days (6 March - 9 March), with exact times and location to be determined.

Computers will be provided on-site for analyses and exercises; however, students may bring their own machines as they like. The workshop will be limited to 20 participants.

DBEV Phylogenomics Workshop 2022

  • g.tiley@kew.org

Workshop based on delivering contemporary and practical education materials for phylogenetics
